Title: Dead or Alive: Final
Genre: Action, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Hitoshi Ishikawa, Yoshinobu Kamo, Toshiki Kimura
Actors: Show Aikawa, Maria Chen, Richard Chen, Jason Chu
Plot: Set in a post apocalyptic Yokohama where the population is kept under rigid control by a half crazed mayor, Riki Takeuchi is a hard boiled cop and Show Aikawa a mellowed out drifter that hooks up with a gang of rebels. When the gang kidnap Takeuchi's son, the wheels are set in motion that leads to an inevitable showdown.
Production: Daiei Motion Picture Company, Excellent Film, Toei Video Company
